description: Translate text from one language to another with support for multiple text formats.

api_key.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication.

target_language.info: The language code of the target language to translate to. Language code is identified by a unique ISO 639-1 two-letter code.

text.info: The text to translate. This can be a single string or a list of strings. If a list is provided, each string will be translated separately.
